faq.question: Can I connect this with my task tracker?
faq.answer: Yes. The workflow exports action items to Jira, Linear, and Notion, plus custom webhooks.

faq.question: Does it support multiple meeting formats?
faq.answer: The template ships with presets for 1:1s, sprint reviews, and discovery calls.

faq.question: How are summaries generated?
faq.answer: You can use AI models or manually curated rules. Both are configured in the JSON dataset.

cta.title: Launch your meeting hub
cta.description: Start with the AI Meeting Notes template and generate hundreds of pages for every team or industry.

faq.question: 可以对接任务管理工具吗？
faq.answer: 可以。支持 Jira、Linear、Notion 的行动项同步，并可配置 webhook。

faq.question: 支持不同会议模板吗？
faq.answer: 内置 1:1、迭代复盘、用户访谈等预设场景。

faq.question: 总结是如何生成的？

faq.question: Can this pull data from our CRM?
faq.answer: Yes. Connect Salesforce or HubSpot to hydrate playbooks with live account data.

faq.question: How do we update templates?
faq.answer: Edit the JSON dataset or import changes from a spreadsheet. Updates go live instantly.

faq.question: Is there support for multiple brands?
faq.answer: Multi-brand setups are supported with theme tokens and per-brand content blocks.
